column5: Anyone else have reports from O'Sullivan Lake in Quebec? We had 11 guys up June 10-17 and did well as usual. My buddy got a 28" 8lb Eye, I got a 26" Eye and many keepers 17-21" (Big ones were all revived and released) Pike was great too; 14 lb, 15lb and a 42" (16lb?) caught/released. Weather was cold and rainy first 4 days, just perfect. Stick baits and jigs were great. How'd you do? Anyone get Lakers? Bust a spring on the road? (We had one down this year, which is good in a group pulling 5 boats) I miss it badly already. Andy
